name: A Superhero Dentist - Bad Evil Teeth With Braces Edition
name_original: A Superhero Dentist - Bad Evil Teeth With Braces Edition
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED!! **
** AWESOME FUN DENTIST GAME!! **

Look up in the sky!! It's your friendly neighborhood's superhero dentist! In this fun game, you play a dentist whose mission is to rescue the teeth of the local superheroes! One by one, you need to fix all their teeth! Can you choose to accept this dangerous mission?

FEATURES

- fun superhero characters.
- cool soundtrack.
- lots of tools.
- everything unlocked!
